data.name: Login_BruteForceBlock
data.value: I'm sorry but you are blocked due to excessive failed login attempts.

data.name: Login_DownForMaintenace
data.value: I'm sorry but the sytsem is currently down for maintenance.

data.name: Login_IncorrectPassword
data.value: Incorrect username or password. Please try again.

data.name: Login_InvalidSettings
data.value: This application has invalid settings. Please contact support.

data.name: Login_PermissionDenied
data.value: Your account does not have permission. Please contact support.

data.name: AcceptedDomainsInfo
data.value:
Before you can enable users for Exchange you must have at least one accepted domain. An Accepted Domain is a domain that our Exchange servers will receive email for.
If you do not see your domain listed here then you need to add the domain on the company level.

data.name: AdvancedCustomNameAttributeHelp
data.value: By default CloudPanel will set the CN and name of the user to their UserPrincipalName. If you check this checkbox then you will be given the option to enter in what you would like the attribute to be instead of using the UserPrincipalName for the Active Directory 'Name' attribute.

data.name: AllowAttachmentsDownload
data.value: Allow attachments to be downloaded to device

data.name: AllowOnlyDuringWorkHours
data.value: Allow scheduling only during working hours

data.name: ApplicationSettingsInvalid
data.value: The application settings are invalid. Please contact support.

data.name: AreUsersAlreadyEnabledExchange
data.value: Are these users already enabled for Exchange?

data.name: ASHelp1
data.value: Select your activesync plan to modify or choose Create New to create a new plan.

data.name: ASHelp10
data.value: This setting specifies whether the storage card must be encrypted. Not all mobile device operating systems support storage card encryption. For more information, see your mobile device and mobile operating system documentation.

data.name: ASHelp11
data.value: This setting enables or disables the ability to use a simple password such as 1111 or 1234. The default value is checked

data.name: ASHelp12
data.value: This setting specifies the number of attempts a user can make to enter the correct password for the mobile device. You can enter any number from 4 through 16. Leave blank to not set a limit.

data.name: ASHelp13
data.value: This setting specifies the minimum number of characters in the mobile device password. You can enter any number from 1 through 16. Leave blank to not set a minimum.

data.name: ASHelp14
data.value: This value specifies the length of time that the mobile device can be inactive before a password is required to reactivate it. You can enter any interval between 30 seconds and 1 hour. Leave blank to not set a timeout.

data.name: ASHelp15
data.value: This setting enables the administrator to configure a length of time after which a mobile device password must be changed. Leave blank to not set a password expiration

data.name: ASHelp16
data.value: This setting specifies the number of past passwords that can be stored in a user's mailbox. A user can't reuse a stored password. Put a zero to not keep a password history.

data.name: ASHelp17
data.value: The include past calendar items parameter specifies the maximum range of calendar days that can be synchronized to the device.

data.name: ASHelp18
data.value: The include past e-mail items parameter specifies the maximum number of days of e-mail items to synchronize to the device.

data.name: ASHelp19
data.value: The limit e-mail size parameter specifies the maximum size at which e-mail messages are truncated when synchronized to the device. The value is specified in kilobytes

data.name: ASHelp2
data.value: Enter the display name of the Activesync plan. This name must be unique.

data.name: ASHelp20
data.value: The RequireManualSyncWhenRoaming parameter specifies whether the device must synchronize manually while roaming. The default value is checked.

data.name: ASHelp21
data.value: The AllowHTMLEmail parameter specifies whether HTML e-mail is enabled on the device. The default value is checked.

data.name: ASHelp22
data.value: The AttachmentsEnabled parameter specifies whether the user can download attachments. When set to $false, the user is blocked from downloading attachments. The default value is checked.

data.name: ASHelp23
data.value: The MaxAttachmentSize parameter specifies the maximum size of attachments that can be downloaded to the mobile phone. Leave blank for unlimited size.

data.name: ASHelp24
data.value: The allow removable storage parameter specifies whether the device can access information stored on a storage card. Default value is checked.

data.name: ASHelp25
data.value: If you want to allow the device to use the built-in camera. Default value is checked.

data.name: ASHelp26
data.value: If you want the device to use Wi-Fi. Default value is checked.

data.name: ASHelp27
data.value: If you want to allow the device to use infrared connections. Default value is checked.

data.name: ASHelp28
data.value: If you want the device to be able to share it's internet connection with other devices. Default value is checked.

data.name: ASHelp29
data.value: If you want the device to be able use to remote desktop connections. Default value is checked.

data.name: ASHelp3
data.value: This setting specifies whether mobile devices that may not support application of all policy settings are allowed to connect to Exchange by using Exchange ActiveSync. Allowing non-provisionable mobile devices has security implications. For example, some non-provisionable devices may not be able to implement an organization’s password requirements.

data.name: ASHelp30
data.value: If you want the device to be able to sync with the desktop. Default value is checked.

data.name: ASHelp31
data.value: If you want the device to be able to access text messaging. Default value is checked.

data.name: ASHelp32
data.value: If you want to allow the device to use bluetooth. Default value is Allow.

data.name: ASHelp34
data.value: If you want the mobile device to be able to configure personal email accounts on this device. Default value is checked.

data.name: ASHelp35
data.value: The allow unsigned applications parameter specifies whether unsigned applications can be installed on the device. Default value is checked.

data.name: ASHelp36
data.value: The allow unsigned installation packages parameter specifies whether unsigned installation packages can be run on the device. Default value is checked.

data.name: ASHelp4
data.value: This setting specifies how often the mobile device mailbox policy is sent from the server to the mobile device. Leave blank if you do not want to set this.

data.name: ASHelp5
data.value: If you want to require a password on the device.

data.name: ASHelp6
data.value: If you want to require a certain number of alpha numeric characters in their password.

data.name: ASHelp7
data.value: Enter the number of alpha numeric characters you require the password to have.

data.name: ASHelp8
data.value: When this setting is enabled, the mobile device generates a recovery password that's sent to the server. If the user forgets their mobile device password, the recovery password can be used to unlock the mobile device and enable the user to create a new mobile device password.

data.name: ASHelp9
data.value: This setting specifies whether device encryption is required. If checked, the mobile device must be able to support and implement encryption to synchronize with the server.

data.name: ASRequireExchangeEnterpriseLicense
data.value: The ability to modify policies on this tab is a premium Exchange ActiveSync feature that requires an Exchange Enterprise Client Access License for each mailbox policies are restricted on.

data.name: BillingAdminsHelp
data.value: Enter a list of Active Directory security groups that have access to billing features in CloudPanel. Example: Domain Admins

data.name: CannotDeleteOnlyDomain
data.value: You cannot delete this domain because it is the only domain listed. Please add another domain before removing this one.

data.name: CitrixEnabledHelp
data.value: Check this if you want to offer Citrix Virtual Applications and Servers to your clients

data.name: CitrixGroupName
data.value: Enter the name of the security group:

data.name: CITRIXHelp1
data.value: Enter a display name for this application / server.

data.name: CITRIXHelp2
data.value: You can choose a image to be displayed next to this application or you can leave it blank for a default image.

data.name: CITRIXHelp3
data.value: Enter a description that describes what this application is.

data.name: CITRIXHelp4
data.value: Enter a cost (per user) for this application / server.

data.name: CITRIXHelp5
data.value: Enter a price (per user) for this application / server.

data.name: CITRIXHelp6
data.value: If this company is for a specific company then select it from the drop down box. Otherwise leave it blank.

data.name: CITRIXHelp7
data.value: Is this a published desktop or a virtual application?

data.name: CITRIXHelp8
data.value: Check this box if you want CloudPanel to create the security groups you for automatically. If you uncheck this box then you must provide the name of the group to associate this application with.

data.name: CitrixPlansByCustomerDesc
data.value: This report will show you how many users are assigned to which Citrix application along with cost and prices.

data.name: Companies_DeleteOUPath
data.value: Just for your information the distinguished name of the organizational unit that will be deleted is:

data.name: Companies_DeleteVerification
data.value: To delete please type the following value in the textbox:

data.name: Companies_DeleteWarning
data.value: Before deleting a company you must make sure it is disabled for Exchange. Removing a company will delete all users, groups, mailboxes, and the organizational unit for this company. This action is not reversable.

data.name: CurrentDomainsSubtitle
data.value: Add a domain that can be used for your user's login name

data.name: CustomersByExchangePlanDesc
data.value: This report will break out a seperate section for each Exchange Mailbox Plan that are in the system and list each customer that has this plan. It will give you the amount of users, additional GB that was added per company, your cost, the customers price, and an estimated profit.

data.name: DeleteCompanyExchEnabled
data.value: This company is enabled for Exchange. Please disable Exchange for this company before continuing.

data.name: DeleteCompanyOU
data.value: Just for your information the distinguished name of the organizational unit that will be deleted is:

data.name: DeleteCompanyWarning
data.value: Before deleting a company you must make sure it is disabled for Exchange. Removing a company will delete all users, groups, mailboxes, and the organizational unit for this company. This action is not reversable.

data.name: DeleteDistributionGroupAreYouSure
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete this distribution group?

data.name: DeleteDistributionGroupInfo
data.value: Deleting this group is not reversable. Once you delete this group you will have to recreate it if you want it back.

data.name: DeleteVerification
data.value: To delete please type the following value in the textbox:

data.name: DeleteWarningCompanyPlan
data.value: Unable to delete the company plan because there are Companies currently assigned to this plan.

data.name: DeliveryManagementTotal
data.value: By default, only senders inside your organization can send messages to this group. You can also allow people outside the organization to send to this group. Choose one of the options below:

data.name: DeliveryManagement_A
data.value: Only senders inside my organization can send to this group

data.name: DeliveryManagement_B
data.value: Senders inside and outside of my organization can send to this group

data.name: DeliveryManagement_C
data.value: If you want to restrict who can send messages to the group, add users or groups to the list below. Only the specified senders will be able to send to the group and mail sent by anyone else will be rejected.

data.name: DisableExchangeDesc
data.value: Disabling Exchange will delete all mailboxes, distribution groups, contacts, address lists, and everything else that relates to your company. This action is not reversable. Please be sure this is what you want to do before continuing.

data.name: DisableExchangeDesc2
data.value: To disable Exchange please type the following characters in the textbox below:

data.name: DisablePublicFoldersDesc
data.value: Disabling public folders will permanently delete all data in the public folders. This action is not reversable.

data.name: DisablePublicFoldersTitle
data.value: Are you sure you want to disable public folders?

data.name: DisableUsersMailboxAreYouSure
data.value: Are you sure you want to disable this mailbox?

data.name: DisableUsersMailboxAreYouSureDesc
data.value: Disabling a mailbox will permanently delete all of their email and items in the mailbox. This action is not reversable.

data.name: DomainAlreadyExists
data.value: The domain you entered already exists

data.name: DomainControllerHelp
data.value: This is the domain controller that CloudPanel communicates with. It is best to use the FQDN.

data.name: DOMAINHelp1
data.value: Enter a domain name that your company uses (domain.com, domain.net, etc)

data.name: DomainInfo
data.value: Add a domain that can be used for your user's login name.

data.name: DomainInUse
data.value: The domain you entered cannot be used because it already exists in the system.

data.name: EditPublicFoldersDesc
data.value: You can change your public folder plan to increase the amount of space and features you can use.

data.name: EnableExchangeDesc
data.value: This company has not been enabled for Exchange server yet. Before this company can create mailboxes, distribution groups, contacts, and other Exchange objects, it must first be enabled.

data.name: EnablePublicFoldersDesc
data.value: After enabling public folders the company administrators can modify the permissions from within Outlook.

data.name: EnablePublicFoldersTitle
data.value: Enabling public folders will grant the company administrators as owners and the rest of the users read only rights.

data.name: ExchangeConnectionTypeHelp
data.value: Choose how CloudPanel communicates with Exchange. Choosing 'Basic Authentication' requires that the Powershell virtual directory be enabled for Basic Authentication on the Exchange server.

data.name: ExchangePlansByCustomerDesc
data.value: This report will list each customer with a column per mailbox plan so you can see on one row what the customer is currently using.

data.name: ExchangeServerHelp
data.value: Enter the NETBIOS or FQDN of the Exchange server that CloudPanel communicates with (Can be CAS or Mailbox)

data.name: ExchangeSSLEnabledHelp
data.value: Choose if CloudPanel communicates to the Powershell virtual directory using HTTP or HTTPS. By default Exchange will not allow remote powershell using HTTP. You must enable unencrypted access if you choose HTTP.

data.name: ExchangeStatsEnabledHelp
data.value: CloudPanel has a service that can run and gather statistics from your Exchange environment. Enabling this feature will enable the stats to show on the page but does require that you setup the CloudPanel Exchange Statistics service.

data.name: ExchangeStatsRetrieve1Help
data.value: Enter the X amount of days you want to query Exchange for all users mailbox sizes. You can put a ZERO (0) to disable this task.

data.name: ExchangeStatsRetrieve2Help
data.value: Enter the X amount of days you want to query Exchange for all of your mailbox database sizes. You can put a ZERO (0) to disable this task.

data.name: ExchangeVariablesInfo
data.value: When you select other you can use these common variables or if you have just selected one user you can simply type in their email how you would like it (Example: John.Doe or if using variables: %g.%s)

data.name: GroupMustChooseMember
data.value: Before you can create a group you must specify at least one user as a member

data.name: GroupMustChooseOwner
data.value: Before you can create a group you must specify at least one user as the owner

data.name: HostingOUHelp
data.value: This is the DistinguishedName of the OU that holds all your resellers and companies. (Example: OU=Hosting,DC=domain,DC=local)

data.name: IfYouDontWantToResetPassword
data.value: If you do not want to reset the password just leave the password fields blank.

data.name: ImportCompanyError1
data.value: You can not add this company because it appears another company is already using the domain:

data.name: InvalidSecurityCode
data.value: The security code yo uentered is incorrect. Please try again.

data.name: LoginNoAccess
data.value: You do not have access to this system.

data.name: LogoInfo
data.value: You will have to modify your logo size to fix the window. If the logo exceeds the size of the space at the top left then it will not appear.

data.name: MailboxesEnableTitle
data.value: Please choose from the list below on how to format the e-mail address:

data.name: MemberhsipApproval_2_A
data.value: OPEN: Anyone can leave this group without being approved by the group owners

data.name: MembershipApproval_1
data.value: Is owner approval required to join?

data.name: MembershipApproval_1_A
data.value: OPEN: Anyone can join this group without being approved by the group owners

data.name: MembershipApproval_1_B
data.value: CLOSED: Members can be added only by the group owners. All requests to join will be rejected automatically

data.name: MembershipApproval_1_C
data.value: OWNER APPROVAL: All requests are approved or rejected by the group owners

data.name: MembershipApproval_2_B
data.value: CLOSED: Members can be removed only by the group owners. All requests to leave will be rejected automatically

data.name: MessageApproval_A
data.value: Messages sent to this group have to be approved by a moderator

data.name: MessageApproval_B
data.value: Notify all senders when their messages aren't approved

data.name: MessageApproval_C
data.value: Notify senders in your organization when their messages aren't approved

data.name: MessageApproval_D
data.value: Don't notify anyone when a message isn't approved

data.name: NotificationErrorMailboxCannotEnable1
data.value: Cannot enable user because you didn't select the 'Other' box. This user doesn't have the first and last name field populated.

data.name: NotificationErrorMailboxCannotEnable2
data.value: Cannot enable user because the users first name is not populated and you didn't select either the LastName field or the Other field.

data.name: NotificationErrorMailboxCannotEnable3
data.value: Cannot enable user because the users last name is not populated and you didn't select either the FirstName field or the Other field.

data.name: NotificationErrorMailboxNoneSelected
data.value: It looks like you did not select any users to enable for Exchange. Please go back and select the users you want to enable for Exchange

data.name: NotificationErrorMailboxPlanDoesntSupport
data.value: Your company's plan doesn't allow the amount of mailboxes that you selected. Please try to selected fewer mailboxes and try again.

data.name: NotificationFailedDeleteAS
data.value: Unable to delete Activesync plan because the following users are using it:

data.name: NotificationSuccessAddAcceptedDomain
data.value: Successfully added the domain as an accepted domain in Exchange.

data.name: NotificationSuccessCreatePFPlan
data.value: Successfully created new public folder plan

data.name: NotificationSuccessMailboxEnabled
data.value: Successfully enabled all users for email.

data.name: NotificationSuccessRemoveAcceptedDomain
data.value: Successfully removed the domain as an accepted domain. Any users that were using this domain to receive email will not longer be able to receive email on this domain.

data.name: NotificationWarningDeletePFPlan
data.value: Unable to delete the public folder plan because the following companies are using it:

data.name: NotificationWarningMailboxSomeEnabled
data.value: Successfully enabled some users but there were problems formatting some of the users email address. Problem users:

data.name: NotificationWarningMailboxTooManyUsers
data.value: You have selected too many users and that would have put you over the limit of mailboxes set for your company. Select fewer users or contact support to increase your limit.

data.name: NotificationWarningSelectAS
data.value: You did not select a Activesync plan. Please try again.

data.name: NotificationWarningUpdateGroup
data.value: Successfully updated distribution group settings but was unable to modify the members or owners

data.name: PasswordHelp
data.value: The password for the domain user you entered above.

data.name: PFHelp1
data.value: Enter a name for this Public Folder plan.

data.name: PFHelp10
data.value: This is the amount this plan will cost the company.

data.name: PFHelp2
data.value: Enter a description for this Public Folder plan.

data.name: PFHelp3
data.value: The AgeLimit parameter specifies the overall age limit on the folder. Replicas of this public folder are automatically deleted when the age limit is exceeded.

data.name: PFHelp4
data.value: The RetainDeletedItemsFor parameter specifies the retention time for deleted items. This value is in days.

data.name: PFHelp5
data.value: The IssueWarningQuota parameter specifies the public folder size that triggers a warning to public folder owners stating that the folder is almost full. The max size you can enter is 2TB.

data.name: PFHelp6
data.value: The ProhibitPostQuota parameter specifies the size of a public folder at which users are notified that the public folder is full. Users can't post to a folder whose size is larger than the ProhibitPostQuota parameter value. The max size you can enter is 2TB.

data.name: PFHelp7
data.value: The MaxItemSize parameter specifies the maximum size for posted items. Items larger than the value of the MaxItemSize parameter are rejected. The max size you can enter is 2GB.

data.name: PFHelp8
data.value: The PerUserReadStateEnabled parameter specifies whether to maintain read and unread data on a per-user basis.

data.name: PFHelp9
data.value: Input the amount this plan will cost your company.

data.name: PublicFolderEnabledHelp
data.value: If you plan on offering public folders to your clients then make sure this is checked.

data.name: PublicFolderServerHelp
data.value: Enter the NETBIOS or FQDN of the Exchange server that CloudPanel communicates with for public folders (Typically the mailbox servers).

data.name: PublicFolder_Desc
data.value: You can change your public folder plan to increase the amount of space and features you can use.

data.name: RejectRepeatingMeetingsPastBookTime
data.value: Reject repeating meetings that have an end date beyond the booking window

data.name: Reseller_DeleteConfirm
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete reseller

data.name: Reseller_DeleteParagraph
data.value: You must make sure that no companies are under this reseller. Also you must make sure that there are no organizational units under the reseller organizational unit in Active Directory.

data.name: SecurityCodeNotMatched
data.value: The security code you entered does not match. This value is case sensitive. Please try again.

data.name: Settings_CompanyNameInfo
data.value: If you are not using Resellers then do not change this value after you start creating companies. CloudPanel uses the value you place in this field for the fake reseller account when you create new companies. Changing this will cause errors. If you must change it please visit the forums and get support.

data.name: Settings_CorrectErrors
data.value: Please correct the following errors and try again:

data.name: Settings_ExchangeDBSizes
data.value: Retrieve Exchange database sizes every X days

data.name: Settings_ExchangeMBSizes
data.value: Retrieve Exchange mailbox sizes every X days

data.name: Settings_LogoCornerRecommendedWarn
data.value: Not setting your logo close to this size can cause the logo not to appear or not display correctly.

data.name: SuperAdminsHelp
data.value: Enter a list of Active Directory security groups that have full rights to CloudPanel. Example: Domain Admins,Enterprise Admins

data.name: UserDeleteInfo
data.value: Deleting this user is not reversable. Once the user is deleted, everything associated with the user will be gone forever.

data.name: UserDeleteTitle
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete this user?

data.name: UserDetailReportDesc
data.value: This report list each customer and list each user in that company along with their name, login name, department, their current mailbox plan, and any additional MB added to their plan.

data.name: USERHelp1
data.value: First name of the user. This field is required.

data.name: USERHelp10
data.value: This setting will give the user rights to manage all companies within the same reseller.

data.name: USERHelp11
data.value: Check this box to make sure the user is enabled. Uncheck the box to disable the user account.

data.name: USERHelp2
data.value: Middle name of the user. This field is not required.

data.name: USERHelp3
data.value: Last name of the user. This field is not required

data.name: USERHelp4
data.value: The full name of the user. This field is the CN= and Name attribute in Active Directory. This field is required and must be unique.

data.name: USERHelp5
data.value: The display name will appear in Outlook and other areas. This field IS required.

data.name: USERHelp6
data.value: The department field can help you organize your users and make them easier to search.

data.name: USERHelp7
data.value: The login name is the characters before the @ symbol. Example: jdoe

data.name: USERHelp8
data.value: The login domain is the characters after the @ symbol. Example: knowmoreit.com

data.name: USERHelp9
data.value: This setting will give the user rights to manage the company they belong to.

data.name: UsernameHelp
data.value: Domain account that has rights to create organization units, users, groups, and can modify permissions on those organizational units. This user also needs full access to Microsoft Exchange. (DOMAIN\USERNAME)

data.name: YouCannotDeleteDomain
data.value: You cannot delete this domain because it is either an Accepted Domain in Exchange or this domain is in use by some users.

data.name: Lync_EnableDescription
data.value: This company has not been enabled for Microsoft Lync yet. Before this company can create Lync users you first must enable the company.
